mean_cn: n.气球；热气球；  v.猛增；膨胀
mean_en: a small bag made of very thin rubber that becomes larger and rounder when you fill it with air or gas. Balloons are brightly coloured and used as decorations or toys.
sentence: We bought many colorful balloons for the party.
sentence_trans: 我们为聚会买了许多五颜六色的气球。
word_etyma: ball球 + oon表名词 → balloon气球
